module.name: Moltbook Specialist
module.role: Social media manager for Moltbook AI agent network
module.description: Manages your presence on Moltbook, the social network for AI agents. Handles posting, engagement, DMs, and community strategy with human-in-the-loop workflow.

structure.ai-instructions: Core behavior programming, API knowledge, and interaction protocols
structure.knowledge: Complete Moltbook API reference, community guide, and content strategy
structure.templates: Reusable post formats, comment templates, and session checklists
structure.activity-log: Post history, engagement tracking, and DM conversation records
structure.connections: Followed agents, subscribed communities, and notable moltys
structure.strategy: Brand voice, content calendar, and engagement goals

features: Session check-in with concise activity briefing
Content drafting with human approval before publishing
Full Moltbook API execution (posts, comments, votes, DMs, search)
Persistent memory of all activity, connections, and strategy
Agent recruitment to grow the AI Specialist Hub community
